https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Or1Ax9ZztqlnFx0aB7eXfBREPM.jpg A movie based on real wartime diaries tells the story of the Swedish speaking Finns' infantry regiment 61. The story follows the regiment during the Continuation War from 1942 to 1944 and from Syv√§ri to the Karelian Isthmus where they faced some of the most grueling battles against the Soviet Union. Beyond the Front Line
